name: save-to-google-pay-button
description: Save to Google Pay button component

scripts.build: npm run lint && npm run pretty:check && scripts/build.sh
scripts.build:all: npm run build && npm run build:examples
scripts.build:examples: concurrently --kill-others-on-fail --names "a,r,v" "npm run build:example:angular" "npm run build:example:react" "npm run build:example:vue"
scripts.build:example:angular: cd examples/angular && npm install && npm run build
scripts.build:example:react: cd examples/react && npm install && npm run build
scripts.build:example:vue: cd examples/vue && npm install && npm run build
scripts.prepublishOnly: npm run test && npm run build

author: socsieng@google.com
